00006 def parse():
00007     try:
00008         start_index = 1
00009         if len(sys.argv) > 1:
00010             if not sys.argv[1].startswith('-'):
00011                 start_index = 2
00012         optlist, args = getopt.getopt(sys.argv[start_index:], 'c:d:ef:g:hm:n:o:s:p:', ['folder', 'help', 'popsize=', 'generations=', 'selection='])
00013     except:
00014         optlist = []
00015 
00016     _args = {}
00017 
00018     # Parse command line
00019     for o, value in optlist:
00020         if o == "-c":
00021             # Who to compare to based on the user input
00022             value = value.strip()
00023             _args['compare'] = value
00024 
00025         elif o == "-e":
00026             # Use elitist selection
00027             _args['elitist'] = True
00028 
00029         elif o in ("-f"):
00030             # other config file name
00031             _args['config'] = value.strip()
00032 
00033         elif o in ("-n", '--popsize'):
00034             # Specify population size in command line
00035             _args['popSize'] = int(value.strip())
00036         elif o == "-o":
00037             # Output file
00038             _args['output'] = value.strip()
00039         elif o == "-m":
00040             # Output file
00041             _args['mutation'] = float(value.strip())
00042         elif o == "-d":
00043             _args['displayNum'] = value.strip()
00044 
00045         elif o in ("-s", '--step'):
00046             # number of iterations
00047             _args['stepSize'] = int(value.strip())
00048 
00049         elif o == "--generations":
00050             # number of iterations
00051             _args['generations'] = int(value.strip())
00052 
00053         elif o == "--selection":
00054             # number of iterations
00055             value = value.strip()
00056             if value.startswith('roul'):
00057                 _args['selection'] = 'roulette'
00058             elif value.startswith('tour'):
00059                 _args['selection'] = 'tournament'
00060             else:
00061                 _args['selection'] = value
00062 
00063         elif o == "-p":
00064             # port number
00065             _args['port'] = int(value.strip())
00066 
00067         elif o == "-g":
00068             # port number
00069             _args['gui'] = value.strip()
00070 
00071 
00072         elif o in ("-h", '--help'):
00073             # display help
00074             print 'Help Menu:'
00075 #            helpStr = '''
00076 #        -h, --help          Display help menu
00077 #        -m                  Mutation rate

00079 #        -o                  Output file name
00080 #        -s, --step          Step size; how many time steps to skip without user picking
00081 #

00083 #            '''
